content: I created a pixel art character for my NFT project! Used a limited 8-color palette with cel shading. The character has a cyberpunk aesthetic with neon green highlights. Here's the link: https://example.com/my-pixel-art.png

Made a meme about the recent market dip using the Drake format. Top text: 'Checking portfolio every 5 minutes', bottom text: 'Still checking portfolio every 5 minutes'. Posted it on Twitter and got 50+ retweets!

Designed a banner for our Discord server using the rule of thirds and golden ratio. Incorporated our project's lore elements - the hoodie character in the foreground with the city skyline in the background. Used complementary colors (purple/orange) for maximum impact.

Created 5 custom traits for our NFT collection: 1) Cyber Hoodie (rare), 2) Neon Glasses (uncommon), 3) Pixel Sword (legendary), 4) Retro Backpack (common), 5) Glitch Effect (epic). Each trait has 3-5 variations. Files are ready for minting!
